name: RasCar
tagline: WiFi Controlled, RaspberryPI powered RC Car.
body:
### Welcome.

Rascar is a project where we removed the RC module of a toy car and turned it into a WiFi controlled toy car with video stream property, using a Raspberry PI.

![](http://i.imgur.com/pTItbGe.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
